opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 25th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, Cross Petition for Allowance of Appeal, and Application to Submit Brief Reply in Support of their Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
